author: Observer-Dispatch
title: Comets send Fox to Kalamazoo
text: Comets send Fox to Kalamazoo The Utica Comets trimmed their roster Wednesday. Forward Dane Fox was sent to Kalamazoo of the ECHL. The move cuts the roster down to 27 players (16 forwards, 9 defensemen, 2 goalies). Comment Posted Oct. 14, 2015 at 8:20 PM By Observer-Dispatch Posted Oct. 14, 2015 at 8:20 PM The Utica Comets trimmed their roster Wednesday. Forward Dane Fox was sent to Kalamazoo of the ECHL. The move cuts the roster down to 27 players (16 forwards, 9 defensemen, 2 goalies). The Comets (0-1-0-0) are on the road Saturday at Hartford. They open their home schedule next Wednesday against Rochester. By Observer-Dispatch
